Use natural remedies: Instead of relying on medication, you can try natural remedies such as honey, lemon, ginger, and tea to help alleviate symptoms of a cold.
Get plenty of rest: A common cold is caused by a virus, and the best way to fight it is to rest your body and allow it to heal naturally.
Stay hydrated: Drinking plenty of water can help to loosen congestion and reduce the severity of symptoms.
Use essential oils: Essential oils such as eucalyptus, peppermint, and tea tree oil can help to clear congestion and soothe sore throats.

Take vitamin C: Vitamin C can help to boost the immune system and reduce the severity of symptoms. You can take vitamin C supplements or eat foods rich in vitamin C such as citrus fruits, berries, and kiwi.
